item.title: Notch's surprise?
item.dc:creator: @ratbagmasta ratbagmasta
item.description:
@ratbagmasta wrote:

I can guess, by the time of the first post, that either that surprise wasn’t anything Mine-related, or that it was in minutes, and not in seconds. Anyone knows something?

Read full topic

@zuppers wrote:

item.title: Notch's surprise?
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:18, topic:409695”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=510971.msg3708461#msg3708461 date=1313189318]

its definitely in seconds, divide it by 60 and it comes to 497, divide by 60 again and it reduces to 8 something, and the twitter was posted 7 hours ago so it seems clear to me whatever he has intended it would be 8 hours from when he posted that tweet, and notice you cant login to minecraft.net at this time.

x-files music starts playing

I can ._.
[/quote]

Using your browser…

Edit: nvm it worked on firefox but not on chrome wat…[/quote]
im playing mc atm :3

OMG notch used a portal reference again! valve sue notch!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Notch's surprise?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:14, topic:409695”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=510971.msg3708126#msg3708126 date=1313176612]
1.7.4, maybe?

Or he could just release a load of info on 1.8, but he’s not going to release 1.8 early as ppl have already said.

Oh…

Wedding Weekend!
Hi everyone! I’m getting married to ez tomorrow, and I thought we’d celebrate by giving one free copy of Minecraft to everyone who buys the game!

http://notch.tumblr.com/
[/quote]

only people who buy minecraft jouring the event get a gift code… FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU[/quote]
Aww thats gay…

item.title: Notch's surprise?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:4, topic:409695”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=510971.msg3707895#msg3707895 date=1313162001]
Minutes until 1.8.

1440 minutes in a day, this equals about 20 days, roughly the release date of 1.8.
[/quote]
Think he’s delayed it long enough >.<[/quote]
Well then we’d have 1.8 at the end of the day.

Read full topic
